features: This contemporary Vanki pendant reimagines the traditional armlet design for modern wear. Smooth edges ensure comfortable wear. This Vanki can be adorned as a pendant. The Vanki is known to be traditional Telugu design.

description: A modern interpretation of a traditional South Indian design, combining cultural significance with contemporary style.
